abstract: Donald Trump reaches deal to buy Turnberry, picturesque golf course and resort on west coast of Scotland that has hosted the British Open four times.
lead_paragraph: Donald Trump reached a deal to buy Turnberry, the picturesque links course and resort on the west coast of Scotland that has hosted the British Open four times.
snippet: Donald Trump reached a deal to buy Turnberry, the picturesque links course and resort on the west coast of Scotland that has hosted the British Open four times....
